Publishing GIS maps over the internet is a great way to share our GIS discovery to a wider community. However, building a geoweb mapping application required basic web programming skills such as html, JavaScript and CSS which is beyond the capability of most GIS analysts. In this hands-on exercise, you will learn how to use the **QGIS2Web** plugin of QGIS to build a geoweb map application from your QGIS project.

By the end of this hands-on exercise, you will be able to:









::: {.cell}

:::
